title: Mood Disorders
details: A mood disorder is a class of serious mental illnesses. The term broadly describes all types of depression and bipolar disorders.
name: suzon

title: Anxiety Disorders
details: Anxiety disorders are a type of mental health condition. Anxiety makes it difficult to get through your day.

title: Personality Disorders
details: Personality disorders are long-term patterns of behavior and inner experiences that differs significantly from what is expected.

title: Eating Disorders
details: Eating disorders are behavioral characterized by severe and persistent disturbance in eating behaviors and associated emotions.

title: Substance Abuse Disorders
details: Substance use disorder is the persistent use of drugs (including alcohol) despite substantial harm and adverse consequences.

title: Trauma Disorders
details: Trauma disorders are mental health conditions that are caused by a traumatic experience.
